content: *a sheer spiderweb top and a solid pop color tank work together in this fresh take on summer layering shown in patons grace patons yarns * skill level intermediate sizes to fit bust measurement extra-small/small 28-34 \ 71-86 5 cm medium 36-38 \ 91 5-96 5 cm large 40-42 \ 101 5-106 5cm extra-large 44-46 \ 112-117 cm 2/3 x-large 48-54 \ 122-137 cm 4/5 x-large 56-62 \ 142-157 5 cm finished bust extra-small/small 37 \ 94 cm medium 41 \ 104 cm large 45 \ 114 5 cm extra-large 48 \ 122 cm 2/3 x-large 56 \ 142 cm 4/5 x-large 64 \ 162 5 cm materials patons® grace™ 50 g/1 75 oz 125 m/136 yds sizes xs/s m l xl 2/3xl 4/5xl main color mc clay 62044 3 3 4 4 4 5 balls contrast a lemon lime 62222 4 4 4 5 5 6 balls *2 colors 7-11 balls total* size 4 mm u s g/6 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge pattern provides directions for solid tank worked in contrast a and spiderweb tank worked in main color which is worn over the solid tank finishing sew shoulder seams of spiderweb and solid tanks together to join crochet pattern chart is provided in pdf download april 2013
